name: 劉宛育
objective:
表現法工具與應用。
The course will introduce basic skills and applications of traditional and digital tools utilized for architectural presentation.

修課同學請加入課程FB社團 https://www.facebook.com/groups/ntutarch155/
schedule:
week 01　（和平紀念日補假）
week 02　Introduction 修課必出席 + Models
week 03　InDesign tutorial I
week 04　Review I
week 05　InDesign tutorial II
week 06　（兒童節補假）
week 07　Review II
week 08　Drawings + Photoshop basic tutorial 
week 09　（期中考週）
week 10　Photoshop advanced tutorial II
week 11　Presentation（畢業設計總評）
week 12　Photoshop advanced tutorial II
week 13　SketchUp advanced tutorial
week 14　Diagrams
week 15　Layout
week 16　Final
week 17　（端午節補假）
week 18　（期末考週）
